# Mixes

## Usage
`@mixes <OtherObjectPath>`
 
## Overview
Indicates that symbol mixes in all the members from `OtherObjectPath`.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @mixes Eventful
 */
var FormButton = function() {
    // code...
};

mix(Eventful).into(FormButton);
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-mixes.html)**
